channel.title: emo cd
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "emo cd" - how?

item.title: Re: emo cd
item.content:encoded: Just farm with Rover or Rover's mom, plus Emosuke, on B-rank Tai if you're in a hurry. If you're not in a hurry and need to farm something else too (like smokebombs, or silver petals), D-rank with Emo will do.

item.title: Re: emo cd
item.content:encoded: Yeah, they are hard to get these days. The mission "Subdue Attack Dogs" from C-ranks drops them. Red Rover and Rover's Mom drops them. So it is better to farm with these allies if you really want to get some Dog Treats.

item.title: Re: emo cd
item.content:encoded: ok.but for the jutsu i need dogtreats.and they are hard to get to

item.title: Re: emo cd
item.content:encoded:
You can farm Tai B-ranks mission and look for the mission, "Rock Out on Stage". This mission drops Emo Rock CDs. If you have EDUT, it is almost an instant get.

Another alternative is, if you have access to Wastelands, Sound Four drops Emo CDs too.

To be ranked no.2, you need to get the second most rankings xp for that day amongst the S1 Jonin in the BvS world. If you ranked no. 2 Jonin, you can also become a Sannin.

item.title: emo cd
item.content:encoded:
i am a level 43 jonin and since i was around 38 or so put emosuke in my team.but all i get is 12 cds.can you suggest anything?
oh and how can i be ranked 2 for the day?i realy need it.
